articles.title: States are pushing for more scrutiny of antisemitism in schools
articles.description:
A Massachusetts state commission formed last year to combat antisemitism found it was a “pervasive and escalating problem” in schools.

The post States are pushing for more scrutiny of antisemitism in schools appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts commission reports antisemitism in schools is pervasive and escalating.
Commission formed last year highlights urgent need for increased scrutiny in education.
Local schools may face new policies aimed at combating antisemitism effectively.

articles.title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Nikki Glaser hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’
articles.description:
Nikki Glaser hosted the Nov. 8 episode of "Saturday Night Live," with Sombr as musical guest.

The post ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Nikki Glaser hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nikki Glaser hosted 'Saturday Night Live' on November 8, showcasing her comedic talent.
Musical guest Sombr performed, adding local flavor to the national broadcast.
Boston residents can enjoy Glaser's humor, reflecting the city's vibrant entertainment scene.
